chart.title: Dealt with anxiety or depression by engaging in religious/spiritual activities
chart.subtitle: Respondents who reported that they 'felt so anxious or depressed that they could not continue their regular daily activities as they normally would for two weeks or longer' were asked whether they ever engaged in religious/spiritual activities to make themselves feel better.
